alert.note: Alert for McLean; Woodford (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 12:30AM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Woodford and northwestern McLean Counties through 1245 AM CDT... At 1230 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hudson, or 9 miles north of Bloomington, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Towanda around 1240 AM CDT. El Paso around 1245 AM CDT. This includes the following highways... Interstate 39 between mile markers 2 and 13. Interstate 55 between mile markers 170 and 178. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
